name: Verify underwriter should able to perform cancellation selecting '<CancellationType>' cancellation type and the same is updated in Billing

testSteps.description: 1: Verify underwriter should able to perform cancellation selecting 'Flat' cancellation type and the same is updated in Billing ({CancellationType=Flat, CancellationReason=Duplicate Coverage})

children.description:
And underwriter perform cancellation on policy with given details as
| CancelType | CancelReason |
| Flat | Duplicate Coverage |
And policy transaction action should be 'cancellation'
And underwriter completes transaction and policy is cancelled successfully
And underwriter is on home page
And underwriter navigates to Billing Workbench
When underwriter searches for the policy in billing workbench and go to cancellation tab
Then cancellation type 'Flat' and cancellation reason 'Duplicate Coverage' should be reflected in Billing system

And underwriter navigates to Billing Workbench
